reviewText: Not combined on a single disk. Three individual disks, like from the original single Blu-rays.
Three of Oliver Stone's better movies in one package
perfect edition for any Oliver Stone movie lover, plus 3 in one! Can't beat that.

Bought this for Any Given Sunday and JFK. I've always loved Oliver Stone's films. Natural Born Killers may have been iconic at the time of it's release,but just seems an oddity back to back w/the other two films ,especially JFK.
Quick delivery and product as described.  Thank you.
NBK is one of my favorite movies ever! didn't watch the other ones yet
I bought this mainly for JFK because it was cheaper that way. I liked Nature Born Killers so it was a plus for me. Any Given Sunday was a good movie and I liked it but I never watched it before.
